meanings.definition: A small group of birds, especially partridges or quails, that are gathered together.
meanings.sent1: In the forest, we spotted several coveys of quails pecking at the ground.
meanings.sent2: The wildlife reserve is home to various coveys of partridges.
meanings.sent3: The coveys of quails decided to have a race to see who could run the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The coveys of partridges moved in unison, like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The colorful feathers of the coveys made a beautiful sight against the greenery.

meanings.definition: A small group or collection of people or things.
meanings.sent1: At the market, you can find coveys of vendors selling fresh produce.
meanings.sent2: The library has coveys of books on various subjects for readers to explore.
meanings.sent3: The coveys of students gathered around the teacher, eager to learn.
meanings.sent4: The coveys of clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The coveys of seashells on the beach were a treasure for collectors.
